agree: By creating and logging in to your account, you have read and agree to each of the following:
authorize: I authorize the Aidoo Platform to email me for:

delete.title: Delete Account!
delete.message: If you delete your account, you won't have access to any unit.

deleteAccount: Your account has been deleted successfully
fail: Something went wrong, please try again later

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Please enter your email address to request a Password reset.

logoutConfirm: Do you really want to log out?
logoutReason: Your session has been closed correctly.
name: First Name

notValidate.title: Not verified!
notValidate.message: Your account has not been verified. Do you want to receive a new validation email?

resetPassword.title: Done!
resetPassword.message: Check your email to for change password.

sessionClosed: Your session has been closed by other zones
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Go back to login and try again.

signUp.title: Done!
signUp.message: Your account has been created. Check your email to for validation.

sundayFirst: Sunday first day of the week
title: My Account

userNotAvailable.title: Ooops!
userNotAvailable.message: Sorry, there is already a registered user with this information. Check your data or try to login.

userNotExist: Sorry, there isn't any user with this data.
